A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: UNDERWHELMING. Any other movie I would have given maybe 3 stars. But this is flippin Star Wars! It wasted the characters and plot points introduced in TFA\, instead introducing more minor characters. The story meandered and is ultimately very boring the first half\, with a slight pickup towards the end\, but still a lame ending. The music was extremely lackluster\, only stereotypical orchestra music with nothing memorable. And there was no true one-on-one lightsaber fighting! Overall disappointed in the wasted potential.
